Description: Remote Job - Online Data AnalystTELUS International AI Data Solutions is currently hiring Online Data Analyst in Ireland with Full Professional Proficiency in English. This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work on your own time whenever work is available.The role: You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, and determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.Skills
Skills: ◦ You must be living in Ireland for the last 2 consecutive years
◦ Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information
◦ You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Ireland
◦ Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. News, Audio tasks, Relevance)
◦ Applicants must be 18 years or over.
Don’t miss the chance to earn extra income working from the comfort of your own home. This is a great opportunity for you and your friends!
